message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds immense value for someone like you, and I'm confident you'll find it highly beneficial.  Given its potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,800,000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I think $1,800,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get out of it.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While $1,400,000 is a respectable figure, the true value of this product is significantly higher, especially considering the benefits it offers. I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000.  I believe this price point reflects a fair compromise.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,550,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get out of the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I've tried to be flexible, but the value of this product is truly substantial. I can't go lower than $1,600,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I understand that you're firm on the price, but I'm not willing to go above $1,500,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and make a final offer of $1,575,000. I hope we can come to a mutually agreeable price.
